name: SewBullet-prototype
description:
SewBullet

Is a western-themed fighting and shooting game where fashion and genetic alteration play an important role, taking references from game mechanics such as Metal Gear, Fallout and Farcry.

-At the moment it is in the experimental phase so there are many bugs.

-There are only 2 missions and 4 interactable NPCs.

Instructions:

Controls || Keyboard

A || Space : Evade/Run.

X || E : Reload/Interactual/Ride horse.

Y || X : Melee combat mode.

B || C : Crouch/Lie down.

RB || Q : Draw weapon / Weapon selector.

LB || 1 : Change weapon sight.

RT || Left click : Shoot/Hit.

LT || Right click : Aim/Block.

RS || F : First person mode.

Up || Shift : Call Horse.

Keyboard Only:

Alt F4 : Close the game.

Shift + Left Arrow || Shift + Right Arrow : change type skin,

Shift + Down Arrow : Apply type skin,

Requirements:

Processor: unknown.

Memory: 6gb ram.

Graphic: 2gb Vram.
